title: Continuum The War Files Complete Comic Series
description:
This a comic that you can only access from the Continuum site if you live in Canada. It was also available in a beautiful graphic novel format. It was released in a limited print run at Toronto's Fan Expo 2012.
The images are in 2 page format. Great if you're reading on computer, not so great if you read all your comic on an iPad like do. Still I appreciate that enterprising Canadian and the comic is really good. It explains a lot about why Kiera is so driven to bring down Liber8.

"Continuum The War Files, an 8 part graphic novel tells the story of 
Kiera during the war between the Global Corporate Congress and the 
Liber8 rebels, featuring stories by Continuum creator Simon Barry and 
star Rachel Nichols.

Issue 1: Fire
Issue 2: Front
Issue 3: Casualty
Issue 4: Collateral
Issue 5: Hostage
Issue 6: Entrenched
Issue 7: Retreat
Issue 8: Victory
